signin.title: Sign In to Audetic
signin.details: Just enter your email, and we'll send you a link to get started. Whether you're new here or coming back, you're only a click away from joining the Audetic revolution resolution.

verify.checkInbox: Check your inbox! If we found your email address you'll have a link to login waiting for you.
verify.spam: Sometimes this can land in SPAM! While we hope that isn't the case if it doesn't arrive in a minute or three, please check.
